feed.title: A critique of bitcoin open source community

entry.title: A critique of bitcoin open source community
entry.summary: The context describes the disappointment of a person who hoped to find something useful but instead found absurd ranting. The quote mentioned in the context talks about bitcoin contributors and how they mostly hide their identities, with Gavin Andresen being a well-known South African anarchist/crypto-libertarian. The person who wrote the context questions why anyone should care about this contributor and doubts the credibility of the person who misspelled his name and described him as an anarchist. The context also briefly mentions the gender skew in open-source development but suggests that it's not the appropriate platform to discuss it in detail.
